weapon.name: Plasma Gun
weapon.effectDescription:
Base effect
Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see.

Phase glide
Move 1 or 2 squares. This effect can be used before the basic affect.

Charged shot
deal 1 additional damage to your target.

weapon.name: Whisper
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic effect
Deal 3 damage and 1 mark to 1 target you can see. Your target must be at least 2 moves away from you.

weapon.name: Electroscythe
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic mode
Deal 1 damage to every other player on your square.

Reaper mode
Deal 2 damage to every other player on your square.

weapon.name: Tarctor Beam
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic mode
Move a target 0,1 or 2 sqaures to a square you can see, and give it 2 damage.

Punisher mode
Choose a target 0,1 or 2 squares away frm you. Move the target to your sqaure and deal 3 damage to it.

weapon.name: Vortex Cannon
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic effect
Choose a square you can see, but not your square. Call it "the vortex". Choose a target on the vortex or 1 move away from it. Move it onto the vortex and give it 2 damage.

Black hole
Choose up to 2 target on the vortex or 1 move away from it. Move them onto the vortex and give them each 1 damage.

weapon.name: Furnace
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic mode
Choose a room you can see, but not the room you are in. Del 1 damage to everyone in that room.

Cozy fire mode
Choose a sqaure exacly one move away. Deal 1 damage and 1 mark to everyone on that square.

weapon.name: Heatseeker
weapon.effectDescription:
Effect
Choose 1 target you cannot see and deal 3 damage to it.

weapon.name: Hellion
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic mode
Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see al least 1 move away. then give 1 mark to that target and everyoe else on that sqaure.

Nano-tracer mode
Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see at least 1 move away. then give 2 marks to that target and everyone else on tat square.

weapon.name: Flamethrower
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic mode
Choose a square 1 move away and possibly a second square 1 more move away in the same direction. On each sqaure, you may choose 1 target and give it 1 damage.

Barbecue mode
Choose a square 1 move away and possibly a second square 1 more move away in the same direction. deal 2 damage to everyone on the first square and 1 damage to everyone on the second square.

weapon.name: Grenade Launcher
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic effect
Deal1 damage to 1 target you can see. Then you may move the target 1 square.

Extra grenade
deal 1 damage to every player on a square yu can see. you can use this before or after the basic effect's move.

weapon.name: Rocket launcher
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic effect
Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see tht is not on your square. Then you may move the target 1 sqaure.

Rocket jump
Move 1 or 2 squares. This effect can be used before basic effect.

Fragment warhead
During the basic effect, deal 1 damage to every player on your target's original square-including the target, even if yu move it.

weapon.name: Railgun
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic mode
Choose a cardinal direction and 1 target in that direction. Deal 3 damage to it. You can attack through walls.

Piercing mode
Choose a cardinal direction and 1 or 2 target in that direction. Deal 2 damage to each. You can attack through walls.

weapon.name: Cyberblade
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic effect
Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your square.

Shadowstep
Move 1 square before or after the basic effect.

Slice and dice
deal 2 damage to a different target on your square. The shadowstep mau be used before or after this effect.

weapon.name: ZX-2
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic mode
Deal 1 damage and 2 marks to 1 target you can see.

Scanner mode
Choose up to 3 targets you can see and del 1 marks to each.

weapon.name: Shotgun
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic mode
Deal 3 damage to 1 target on your square. If you want, you may then move the target 1 square.

Long barrel mode
Deal 2 damage to 1 target on any square exactly one move away.

weapon.name: Power glove
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic mode
Choose 1 target on any square exactly 1 move away. Move onto that square and give the target 1 damage and 2 marks.

Rocket fist mode
Choose 1 target on any square exactly 1 move away. Move onto that square. You may deal 2 damage to 1 target there. If you want, you may move 1 more square in that same direction. You may deal 2 damage to 1 target there, as well.

weapon.name: Shockwave
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic mode
Chose up to 3 target on different squares, each exactly 1 move away. Deal 1 damage to each other target.

Tsunami mode
Deal 1 damage to all target that are exactly 1 move away.

weapon.name: Sledgehammer
weapon.effectDescription:
Basic mode
Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your square.

Pulverize mode
Deal 3 damage to 1 target on your square, then move that target 0,1 or 2 squares in one direction.
